contents.text: Thank you for calling Bolt, the San Francisco–based commerce platform that drives online revenue with a better-than-Amazon, zero-fraud checkout.
For sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
To discuss integrating our better-than-Amazon checkout on your site, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to open a Bolt account and implement their checkout on my website.
I’d like to speak with a sales specialist about integrating Bolt’s checkout on my veteran-owned online store.
Discuss API integration endpoints and SDK setup for Bolt’s zero-fraud checkout
I’d like help opening a Bolt account and having someone walk me through adding your checkout to my website.
I’d like to speak with sales about integrating Bolt’s checkout into my site.

contents.text: To review pricing plans and discover how we can boost your revenue by up to twenty percent, press 2.
Please hold for a pricing consultant.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review Bolt’s pricing plans and find the best option to grow my sales.
I need to discuss pricing plans and see how Bolt can boost revenue for my small business.
Obtain detailed pricing tiers and ROI projections for Bolt’s enterprise plan
I’m on a tight budget and need someone to explain your pricing plans and help me choose the best option.
I need to review Bolt’s pricing plans to estimate costs for my project.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
For technical support with your current integration, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m having issues with our current Bolt checkout integration and need technical help.
I’m seeking technical support to troubleshoot my current Bolt integration on my website.
Resolve authentication and session-timeout errors in my current Bolt API integration
I’m getting errors with my current Bolt integration and need patient, step-by-step technical support.
I’m experiencing errors with my current Bolt integration and need technical support.

contents.text: For assistance with fraud protection and risk management, press 2.
Please hold for our fraud prevention team.

navigationGoals: I want to set up fraud protection and understand Bolt’s risk management features.
I want to connect with the fraud prevention team to set up risk management for my e-commerce site.
Consult on advanced fraud-detection algorithms and chargeback prevention configurations
I want guidance on preventing fraudulent orders and setting up your risk management features.
I want assistance configuring Bolt’s fraud prevention features.
